On Jun 4, 2010, at 6:13 PM, Glenn Block wrote:

> Yes
> 
> I am thinking of something a bit different though. Insteads of having
> just a lunch, what if we meet for two to three ours at the MS campus
> in London?

Great. The more time you can spend on this the better.

> This way we could have a brainstorming / design type
> discussion. I'll supply lunch :-)
> 

Looking forward to it :-)

> My thinking would be Thursday the week of the 12th of July.
> 

That would be the 15th, yes?


> What to you guys think?
> 

Sounds fine.

Jan


> Glenn
>
